recipe.title: Crème Fraîche Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: 2/3 cup crème fraîche or sour cream
instructions: Cook potatoes in large pot of boiling salted water until just tender, about 25 minutes. Drain. Return potatoes to pot. Add crème fraîche and butter; mash until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. (Potatoes can be made 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Rewarm over low heat, stirring frequently.)
